attributes.action: Create a new law making it mandatory for prison staff officials to read bed time storys to all convicts in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Daily bed time story readings should be made mandatory in prisons across the U.K.
They should be read by prison staff who should first undertake a two week training course and pass the examination in the subject. 
The following materials have been found to be unsuitable for this purpose:
All forms of poetry excluding stories written in verse.
Mr.Men books.
Children's television programs should not be shown instead of the readings as they may excite the convicts before bedtime. 
The following are highly recommended:
A.A Milne.
Enid Blighton.
Beatrix Potter.

Cautionary tales are very highly recommended.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
